content: valin a reversible two-colored brioche cowl by marlene berghout materials yarn main color mc worsted-weight yarn self- striping variegated or solid color approximately 110-120 yds contrast color cc solid-color in same weight approximately 110-120 yds cowl in photo was made with mc painted sky by knitting fever color 226 100% superwash wool cc is cascade 220 superwash 100% wool color 817 needles and notions two 16 circular needles size 8 5 mm and size 6 4 mm you will also need a stitch marker and a tapestry needle for the bind-off and brp = brioche purl burp - purl the stitch that weaving in the ends was slipped in the previous row together with its yarn-over gauge 14 5 sts and 24 row = 4 10cm in brioche rib sl1yo = blocked on a knit or bark row move the yarn forward between the needles slip the next stitch purlwise then bring the yarn over the needle to finished size 9 inches 24 cm tall and 24 inches 66 cm the back ready to work the next stitch circumference when blocked on a purl or burp row the yarn is already in front slip the next stitch purlwise then bring abbreviations the yarn over the needle and back to the front between the needles ready to work the next brk = brioche knit bark - knit the stitch that stitch was slipped in the previous row together with its yarn-over yf = yarn forward between needles v 1 1 © 2017 marlene berghout for personal non-commercial use only all rights reserved marleneberghout@gmail com �1 of �2 cowl using **mc and larger needle size 8 loosely cast on 90 stitches using the old norwegian/german twist cast-on or if using long-tail cast-on over 2 needles held together join for working in the round taking care not to twist stitches switch to smaller needle size 6 place beginning of round marker and work four rounds in garter stitch ie knit one round purl one round knit one round purl one round **note the bottom of the cowl uses just one color if using a self-striping yarn you may wish to begin with the section of color that you wish to be most prominent set-up round knit row *k1 sl1yo repeat from * to end of round brioche rib row 1 purl/brp row yf *sl1yo brp1 repeat from * to end of round row 2 knit/brk row *brk1 sl1yo repeat from * to end of round repeat row 1 and 2 until work measures 1 from cast-on ending with row 2 continue in cc only and work 8 more row in brioche rib 4 counted knit column stitches two-color brioche work row 1 purl/brp row using cc and continue using mc for row 2 next row knit all stitches knit yarn-overs knit/brk row together with the stitch they hug 90 stitches continue in two-color brioche rib until work measures 6 5 inches from cast-on edge ending beginning with a purl row work three rounds
